Body:
What We've Learned Updated: 11 February 2025 - Customer confirmed that the issue is still present in 7.2.0
16 Dec - The customer needs to apply 720 on production
10 Dec - This item was covered in 7.2.0. Customer feedback is needed.
09 Sept - Will be part of 7.2.0 release
02 Sept -  QA confirmed that is all good, problem is solved in 7.2.0
22 July - Bug reported already by our QA team and it's fixed, will be released in 7.2.0

Next Steps Updated: - Check with QA team if the issue is reproducible
- check with customer if the issue is resolved in 7.2.0
